Articles.Content: Only have Kerbal Engineer Redux installed. When a probe is launched it does not show up on the map view. If I change the probe to Debris, Station, Rover, Lander, it will appear in the map view.

Make sure that you haven't just turned off the probe filter in map view. You can change filters by hovering at the top middle of the screen in map view. I believe you also have to have the navball up when doing that.

Make sure that you haven't just turned off the probe filter in map view. You can change filters by hovering at the top middle of the screen in map view. I believe you also have to have the navball up when doing that.

That was exactly the problem, thanks for the help.
